description_for_model:
Plugin to run Replicate models. You must use the `/getModelSchemas` endpoint to find out how to run models, you do not know the API that each of them has. Do not guess how to run them, that will error.
You can get the schemas of popular models are:
replicate/llama-7b (an llm), ai-forever/kandinsky-2 (text to image), stability-ai/stable-diffusion (or 'SD', for Stable diffusion 1.5), cjwbw/damo-text-to-video, rossjillian/controlnet (For stable diffusion 1.5), cjwbw/semantic-segment-anything (identify segments in images and label them), salesforce/blip (describe an image), deforum/deforum_stable_diffusion (for making animations from prompts).
Other schemas for popular diffusion models include: cjwbw/anything-v4.0 (anime images), prompthero/openjourney (like Midjourney). You must use the `/getModelSchemas` endpoint.
